infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Slick fitness uses the camera to allow users to upload their photos and posts. Your photos wont be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Slick fitness only use location to show people near you. So you can find partner near you. It is secure and private.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: Slick fitness only use location to show people near you. So you can find partner near you. It is secure and private.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Slick fitness uses the Photo Library to allow users to upload their photos and posts. Your photos wont be shared without your permission.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Slick fitness uses the Photo Library to allow users to upload their photos and posts. Your photos wont be shared without your permission.
